components.name: Studio
components.description: Please enter tickets related to Titanium Studio here.

fields.description:
When i try to install the Android SDK through the configuraion wizard the android sdk manager says that everything is correctly installed. When i close the manager i get the following error: NLS missing message: MobileSDKConfigurattionProcessor_updatermessage in: com.appcelerator.titanium.mobile.portal.processor.message OK

in titanium studio the configuration wizard says that the Android SDK isn't installed

Can you please help me with this problem.

comments.body:
Hello Laurens,

if you already have the SDK installed on your system, you can setup the URL by going in Preferences | Aptana Studio | Titanium. There, you can set the SDK and NDK paths.

HTH
Resolving as duplicate of linked issue. This will be fixed in Studio 2.1.
